numlitem.para: Lower lobe cargo A/C FLOW RATE (if installed) remains OFF, and
Associated Pack Flow Control Shutoff Valve is secured closed.

note.para: Lower Lobe cargo A/C Flow Rate is installed on UPS aircraft.
The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Carriage of animals and perishables in associated lower cargo compartment is prohibited.
Increase flight plan fuel by 0.6% due to 2 packs operating in HI FLOW Mode.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to associated Pack selector "INOP - OFF" and PACK ___ FLOW CONTROL AND SHUTOFF VALVE INOP CLOSED". Placard the affected Pack switch "PACK OVERHEAT SWITCH INOP". Install Placard adjacent to Lower Lobe CARGO COND AIR FLOW RATE selector on Overhead Maintenance panel (P461) INOP OFF. Enter items in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
